definition: Xiangdong district of Pingxiang city 萍鄉市|萍乡市, Jiangxi
abbr. for Hunan 湖南 province in south central China/abbr. for Xiangjiang river in Hunan province
surname Dong
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Xiangdong district of Pingxiang city 萍鄉市|萍乡市, Jiangxi

sentences.english: Only later, for love or for other changes, to the east.
sentences.chinese: 只是后来，因为爱情或者因为其它的变故，去了湘东。

sentences.english: Aquamarine occurs in rare metal-bearing granite-bearing granite-pegmatitesof northeastern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 湘东北海蓝宝石产于含稀有金属花岗伟晶岩中。

sentences.english: From the Five Dynasties(907-960) on, Dhyana was widely spread in eastern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 唐五代以来，禅宗在湘东得到广泛传播和发展。
